critique: This document is an executive order that amends two previous executive orders related to the Defense Production Act of 1950 and the Interstate Commerce Act. It involves a minor administrative change, replacing "Bureau of Service of the Commission" with "bureau which administers the car-service functions of the Commission as set forth in paragraphs 10 to 17, inclusive, of section 1 of the Interstate Commerce Act, as amended." This change appears to be technical and related to the administration of car-service functions. There is no indication of ideological tilt, immigration policy, expansion or restriction of executive power, federalism implications, national security concerns, economic regulation changes, or social inclusion considerations. Therefore, all scores should be neutral.
